results.definition: the highest level or degree attainable; the highest stage of development
examples: his landscapes were deemed the acme of beauty
the artist's gifts are at their acme
at the height of her career
...catapulted Einstein to the pinnacle of fame
so many highest superlatives achieved by man
at the top of his profession

results.definition: an imaginary great circle on the surface of the earth passing through the north and south poles at right angles to the equator
examples: all points on the same meridian have the same longitude

results.definition: being at the best stage of development
examples: our manhood's prime vigor"- Robert Browning
